description: The island of Sri Lanka was known to Greek and Roman writers by a number of names, including Taprobane, Palaisimoundou, and Salike.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Sri Lanka Pāli: Tambapaṇṇi Skt.: pāra-samudra?
